titleStmt.title: A fuller relation from Bridgewater since the last fight: wherein is declared the fierce and terrible storming of the town, by firing it in three severall places, and the necessity thereof: / sent to the Honorable, William Lenthall Esq; Speaker to the House of Commons. By a worthy gentleman in Sir Tho: Fairfax his army. Ordered by the Commons in Parliament, that this letter be forthwith printed and published: H: Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: Worthy Gentleman in Sir Thomas Fairfax His Army.
Lenthall, William, 1591-1662.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edw. Husband, printer to the Honourable House of Commons,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
